// Transformed coords with a dot() and some shading.
// Stripes are basically a rotated dot().

#define S(v) smoothstep(1., -1., v)
void mainImage( out vec4 o, vec2 f )
{
    vec2 d = cos(6.* // Zoom
        (2.*f-iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y);
        
    float T = iTime*.1,
        c = cos(T),
        s = sin(T);
    
    f = vec2(2., d.x + d.y) // re-using 'f'
        *mat2(c, s, -s, c); // rotation
    
    float W = dot(f,d),
        v = cos(W*2.); // Freq
        
    o = (.5+.5*cos(W + vec4(0,2,4,1))) *(
            S((abs(v) -.5)/fwidth(v)) * S(-v) // edge * shading
            * S(4.*cos(T*9. +4.*(d.x*f.y - d.y*f.x))) // stripes
            + S(abs(v -.5)) // fill+
            + S(.5*v) // fill-
        ) - S(abs(v +.5)) // shade-
        + S(abs(.5 -v) +.5); // shade+
}
